name: circulator
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a machine or device that circulates something such as air or water (= makes it go around or through something): The circulator pumps cool water through the system. a microwave circulator See also
immersion circulator
mainly US someone who circulates (= passes around several people) something such as a petition (= a document signed by a large number of people asking for a particular action): Opponents have alleged that petition circulators used questionable tactics to persuade people to sign.
More examplesFewer examplesA fan is basically an air circulator but it does not cool the air. The bath has a thermal circulator, ensuring that the water maintains a uniform, controlled temperature.The model is a microwave circulator which has three ports, with a cylindrical ferrite rod in the centre.Three circulators admitted faking signatures on the document.
